import React,{useState} from 'react' import Navbar from './navbar/navbarLanding' import './creatorLobby.css' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' const CreatorLobby=()=>{ //states for storage of the create quiz data const [createName,setCreateName]=useState("") const [createRelatedTo,setCreateRelatedTo]=useState("") const [createNoOfQuestions,setCreateNoOfQuestions]=useState(null) const [createTime,setCreateTime]=useState(null) const [createPrivate,setCreatePrivate]=useState(false) const [createQuestions,setCreateQuestions]=useState(null) // states and function for the create modal const [createQuizPopup, setCreateQuizPopup] = useState(false); const handleCreatePopupShow= () => setCreateQuizPopup(true); const handleCreatePopupClose= () => setCreateQuizPopup(false); return(
